Articles.Content:
I swear I was able to do this before.. not sure if they changed something or I just forgot how.

In the tracking station I can enable flags with the button in the upper left. Is there some way to get them to display on the in-flight map too?

Edited December 21, 2014 by zarakon
The same button exists in the same place in the in-flight map view. It's just hidden until you move the mouse near the top of the screen.

Ahhh, I tried that, but I guess I only tried in the upper-left and it's actually in the upper-middle

Thanks
